name: Legend of Inca - Mystical Culture
description:
Countless secrets entwine around the mystical people of the Incas ...

Create an Inca settlement and build all the vital structures and production facilities!
Earn bonuses and power ups, solve hidden object, mahjongg and solitaire games as well as extra levels to get closer to your goal.
Experience the challenge of an exciting match-3 game with lots of trophies, puzzle and bonus games!

- Match 3 game with many extras and exciting levels
- Construction and expansion of an Inca city
- Upgrade levels for all buildings
- Various power ups, upgrades, trophies and extras
- Exciting puzzle, hidden object, mahjong and solitaire games
